title: Chicken salad with mango and black rice
strInstructions: Clean the meat from the bones of the chicken and then cut into smaller pieces. 2. Boil the rice according to the instructions on the package. 3. Cut the green onion thinly. Peel a squash, grate it and cut it into cubes. Cut the mozzarella into equal cubes. 4. Mix the salad with a little olive oil and lemon juice and place on a serving platter. Spread all the ingredients on top of the salad. Season with a little salt and pepper. 5. Sauce: Mix the yoghurt with crushed garlic, honey, olive oil and lemon juice. 6. Drizzle the sauce over the salad and serve with a good loaf of bread.

title: Shrimp pie with curry and dill sauce
strInstructions: Mix the pie dough in a food processor. Roll out the dough and place in a 24 cm large pie tin. Notch the bottom with a fork. Place in the fridge for 20 minutes. Pre-bake the pie crust for about 10 minutes, at 200 Â°. Mix the sauce. Let the prawns drain. Fry the mushrooms with garlic in butter. Whisk eggs and cream. Add salt and cayenne pepper. 5. Add cheese and spinach to the pie crust. Pour over the filling and sprinkle over the drained prawns. Bake for about 40 minutes until the pie has set. 6. Peel the prawns for garnish and garnish the pie. Serve with the sauce.
